description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You awaken to find yourself trapped deep in enemy territory. Who knows where the aliens are, but you must escape quickly... to do that you will need Dark Matter.  Travel through 80 levels to collect the DARK MATTER needed to power your ship and escape from the alien base.  Website: http://www.orbonis.co.uk/darkmatter/ Support: support@orbonis.co.uk
